In the US a woman is beaten every 9 seconds and a child is abused every 2 minutes

Victims in the last 5 minutes,
and counting...

Help Us End the Violence

The Julian Center has been a leader in providing shelter and hope to victims of domestic and sexual violence and their families in central Indiana since 1975. With a mission of Saving Lives! Changing Lives!, The Julian Center assists those thousands of people annually who are dealing with domestic violence and sexual abuse and helps them discover a path to independence through crisis assistance, economic empowerment, transitional services, and long-term support.

How Can You Help?

In order to help those that need us most we appreciate any monetary, time, or item donations.

  • Donate Today
  • or View Volunteer Opportunities

Each year, we protect more than 1,000 in our emergency shelter and serve an additional 6,200 in outreach.
